reviews.review:
Killing Floor es un shooter en primera persona que, pese a sus pobres gráficos, tiene una jugabilidad adictiva. Está integramente centrado en un modo cooperativo para hasta seis personas en el que el objetivo es acabar con oleadas de zombies. Tiene siete clases de personajes muy diferenciadas entre sí y cada una con sus propios perks y armas. 

La dificultad es bastante alta y hay que tener mucha paciencia. Las primeras 10-15 horas son un pelín desesperantes porque no tienes mejoras en los perks de ninguna clase, pero pasado ese tramo, y una vez estás especializado en alguna clase, comienza la diversión porque empiezas a conocerte los mapas, los mejores lugares para situarte y empiezas a jugar en equipo, que es lo más importante para sobrevivir.
Muy fino. E-TER-NO.

Bloody brilliant game. It keeps your heart pounding as enemies attempt to swarm you while you're constantly firing off your shotgun, collecting LOADS OF MONEY, and a whole bunch of other crazy shit in this zombie killing spree of a game. I think I'll play the Left 4 Dead games to see if this game or those two are worthy of my tastes, although which this game is just perfect.

Bei diesem Survival-Horror sollte man schon im Team spielen, denn wenn man dies nicht tut geht man sehr schnell zu grunde...man hat in den meisten fällen 10 Wellen die man zusammen mit seinem Team überstehen muss..Es gibt 7 Perks die man bis zur Stufe 6 aufleveln kann & am besten a sollte sonst hat man auf Suicide or Hell on Earth keine Chance...

- Field medic
- Support specialist
- Sharpshooter
- Commando
- Berserker
- Firebug
- Demolition

Im großen & ganzen ist Killing Floor ein sehr geiles & gelungenes Horror-Survival Game wenn man gut in einem Team zusammen arbeiten kann, denn genau des is hier gefragt ;) *ZUSAMMEN ARBEIT*
Più figo che mai con i continui aggiornamenti degli sviluppatori!

Imagine there are five rollercoasters in front of you, each getting more and more crazy by the looks. You hop on the slowest one to see what other people's crazy about... the ride is smooth and entertaining as blood sprinkles in your face and horrid screams fill your ears, you aren't happy, but neither you are too scared to not love it. As the ride ends you can't wait to get on the next one and see how tough it can get... the moment your cart starts moving, you feel things are getting serious, and the sense of avareness kicks in next to the fun. You helplessly run up to the next coaster in hopes of more fun and feelings, but all you find is mercyless punishment and fear in every turn... but you aren't made of such a weak wood, you HAVE to continue your trip until the finale....
And now here you are, sitting in the cart in the middle of hell, that came to earth. You wish you had born as a god and banished all this madness into nothingess. But in the end you will wish back for it.
Best Underrated survival horror game, and needs more promo's for this on the internet.
This game is hard at first, but as you play longer it gets easier, this game is at its most fun when you play on a update, or holiday

Awesome game, there is so much workshop support it is quite amazing. With new levels from tripwire being added for free, maps being created by the community and hundreds of servers for you to play on. This is a MUST buy game

It's all fun and games until a Level 0 Medic is asking for money on wave 9. That said, Killing Floor is a great survival co-op game. The diversity in enemies, weapons and classes all boil down to a fun time. Best played with friends/someone who knows what they're doing.

Though rough around many, many edges, Killing Floor maintains very forceful combat through its tight weaponry feedback.  The animations and textures are a step above what you'd expect from an "indie" game, and many maps rival the detail of modern AAA games.

If you're a fan of FPSs and arena-style combat, sans any influence on movement (you can't move for shite), Killing Floor will easily provide 50+ hours of enjoyment.
Insane fun, Great soundtrack A must !

Killing Floor is good, frantic fun. The classes are varied between important roles geared towards taking out certain zeds and there is a good choice of weapons nows. The more people you have that actually work together the better the experience will be.
Best game.
Great game to play with friends. level system to make you work for kills. And slow-mo zombie decapitations what more could you ask for?

This game is a heart-racing (or stopping) thriller. It's dark and creepy and when you find your self in that lonesome corner, your team nowhere to be found.....you better wish that low-pitched screeching sound isn't a Fleshpound coming your way. Or worse, Patty coming to pay a little....visit. There's never a dull moment. The gameplay intensifies the deeper you get into the waves with various types of monsters coming your way.

Play it now!

Очень классный Co-Op Survival Horror в котором есть и хорошая графика, и отличная система прокачки, и разнообразные классы персонажей (Медик, Техник, Снайпер и т.д.). В общем об этой игре можно сказать ещё очень много и смело заявить, что это игра индивидуальна и не похожа ни другие игры. Tripwire Interactive очень сильно постаралась над этой игрой и я ей ставлю 5/5.

Though it turns into a bit of a grind at times and the ramp-up in difficulty when there's a lot of players can be ridiculous, Killing Floor is otherwise a solid arena/surivival-type FPS, with plenty of weapons and maps; recommended for a group of friends.

Tired of dealing with your foes, in which you don't have the upper hand? Well, play this game. Here you can blow specimines heads off, and feel good about it while doing it. What's that? You're scarred of going at it alone? Not to worry. Multiplayer mode lets you and your buds gang up and blow off heads, shoot flames, and BE A FRAKIN SCOTTSMAN WITH A CLAYMORE SWORD!

If you enjoy blasting away freakish hellions while standing still in one place for a very long period of time and not moving whatsoever, you'll love this game. 
However, you can STILL run around and kill things if you ever wanted to! 
That's how awesome this game is. 

Also, there's alot of achievements and the ability to level-up, so hurray for replay value.
Just you, your bro's, and your weapons against 11 waves of bloodthirsty mutants. What more could you want?

Killing Floor это отличный сбалонсированный и запоминающийся survival horror.
В эту игру особенно весело играть в компании своих друзей, отлично проведённое время гарантировано!
Также в KF удобная и хорошая система прокачки, которая будет стимулом играть ещё и ещё. 
Графика и звуки  довольно средние, но фоновая музыка реально доставляет.
Чтож эту игру я рекоммендую всем любителям кооп шутеров и шутеров про зомби.
ОЦЕНКА: 9/10

的確に、着実に殺す、正しく殺す丁寧さが求められる、確立されたゲームシステム。
そしてＢ級臭を強く漂わせる、特徴の塊の如き化け物共。
そんなわけで、スペシメン殺そうぜ！

Thank the fucking lord christ all bloomin mighty (or in this case Trip Wire) for The Killing Floor.  Now I know what you all think, "But Yulaw isn't Killing just like Left 4 Dead?" and you'd be right, except these aren't Zombies their mutants and sorry but I find mutants to be far cooler and scarier than Zombies.  (Not that that's got anything to do with me being a mutant or anything!) In fact from what I've found out Killing floor came out long before Left 4 Dead starting as a humble little mod.  This game is just so much fun to play with different character classes and loads of big beefy weapons like Flame thowers, Chainsaws, buzzsaw firing crossbows (no I did not make that up), rocket launchers, energy weapons and even classic pump action, double-barrel and automatic Shotguns to choose from.  All I can say is forget Left 4 Dead and the Zombie mode in COD black ops this is the real Co-op survival shooter right here.  Its even gotten better due to new DLC and added weapons and maps, and two objective modes.  Now while the game is ugly as sin (it is using a slightly moderfied Unreal engine after all) its how it plays.  As I mentioned in the begining there are different classes, 7 infact to choose from all with their own unique strengths, weakness, weapon load outs and can be leveled up as you kill or perform tasks.  Team work is still key, with the goal of the game to survive to the final wave and fight the end boss the Paitriark and yes that is a minigun and rocket launcher stuck to his arm.  Or if your playing the objective mode then its performing tasks.  However, while team work is encurage in the game, it tends to eccurage more of a compedative way of playing, which is sort of a disadvantage to this games premiss, one time you find your self in a team full of people working together, while most of the time you'll be in a team full of idiots who just what to play the game like a Call of Duty title or just be dicks with themselves and others.  Despite this though its a great little game and I couldn't recommend it enough, and with the possibility of a sequile in the works why not give this game a try.
get this game please

There are few games that can match up to Killing Floor for shooting zombies' shit up with your mates. A sprinkling of just the right amount of British humour, interesting classes and cool weapons makes it a game your friends will be nagging you to get.
